QueryResult.text: select odf_ca_clr_key_metric.id odf_pk, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.id as clr_key_metric_key, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.id as clarity_clr_key_metric_key, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.code as id, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.name as name, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.created_date as clarity_created_date, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.last_updated_date as clarity_updated_date, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.odf_parent_id as clr_okr_key, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.vsm_actual_metric as vsm_actual_metric, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.vsm_metric_desc as vsm_metric_desc, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.vsm_status as vsm_status_key, (select NAME from cmn_lookups_v where language_code = dataw_context.language_code and lookup_type = 'VSM_RESULT_STATUS' and rownum = 1 and LOOKUP_CODE = odf_ca_clr_key_metric.vsm_status) as vsm_status_caption, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.vsm_target_date as vsm_target_date, odf_ca_clr_key_metric.vsm_target_metric as vsm_target_metric, dataw_context.language_code, dataw_context.id language_id from odf_ca_clr_key_metric odf_ca_clr_key_metric inner join cmn_languages dataw_context on dataw_context.id = dataw_context.id where 1 = 1 and dataw_context.is_dw_enabled=1
